title: Copper–Vit B3 MOF preparation, characterization and catalytic evaluation in a one-pot synthesis of benzoxanthenones with docking validation as anti H. pylori
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20454-20465
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03468F, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Asma S. Al-Wasidi, Mahmoud Tarek, Gehad E. Said, Ahmed M. Naglah, Abdulrahman A. Almehizia, Tamer K. Khatab
Copper–Vit B3 metal–organic framework was utilized as a nano-catalyst in the one-pot synthesis of some new benzoxanthenones. Synthesized compounds undergo docking validation as anti H. pylori.
